text: Hi. Does this community have any thoughts on the immutability of blockchain, and the potential requirement to be able to edit committed blocks in instances where human error has introduced a bug or an incorrect transaction, or to deal with malicious material as has been seen on Bitcoin?

*Important* Hyperledger is moving from Slack to Rocket Chat. Please use your Linux Foundation identity to sign here <http://chat.hyperledger.org/> Push the CAS button (you will hear a bong sound signifies success).
